page.title: 15A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: I wake up at around 6 o'clock and lie in bed for half an hour until I get up, go downstairs and get changed into my school uniform. I leave for the shop, where they lay out the papers for me to collect. I have roughly forty papers to deliver all round my area and it takes me around 45 minutes. Once I get home, I have my breakfast of high fibre cereals and then watch breakfast television until I leave for school at about 8.20 am and reach school about 25 minutes later when we go in for registration. At school our subjects range from physical education to needlework. School ends at 3.40 pm. When I get home i watch television or play football until about 6.00 pm when I have my tea. Normally, I go to sleep at between 10 and 11 pm.
